statements: SELECT * FROM daily_logs
SELECT id, date, activity FROM daily_logs WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT reflection, accomplishment FROM daily_logs WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, activity, reflection FROM daily_logs WHERE activity LIKE '%exercise%'
SELECT * FROM daily_logs WHERE accomplishment IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, date, activity, accomplishment, reflection FROM daily_logs WHERE date = '2021-08-15';
SELECT * FROM daily_logs WHERE date >= '2021-08-10' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, activity FROM daily_logs WHERE accomplishment IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM daily_logs WHERE reflection LIKE '%positive%' AND date BETWEEN '2021-08-01' AND '2021-08-31';
SELECT id, reflection FROM daily_logs WHERE activity = 'Exercise' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM daily_activities
SELECT activity_name, activity_time FROM daily_activities
SELECT id, activity_description FROM daily_activities WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM reflections
SELECT reflection_date, reflection_text FROM reflections WHERE reflection_date = '2022-09-15'
SELECT * FROM daily_activities WHERE activity_name = 'Running' ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM daily_activities WHERE activity_name LIKE '%Soccer%';
SELECT reflection_text FROM reflections WHERE reflection_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT id, activity_name FROM daily_activities WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(activity_time) FROM daily_activities;
SELECT * FROM daily_activities;
SELECT id, activity_name, location FROM daily_activities;
SELECT activity_name, duration_hours, activity_date FROM daily_activities ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT accomplishment_date, accomplishment_description FROM accomplishments WHERE accomplishment_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT reflection_text, reflection_date FROM reflections WHERE related_activity_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM daily_activities WHERE duration_hours > 2 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, location FROM daily_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';

SELECT d.activity_name, a.accomplishment_description FROM daily_activities d INNER JOIN accomplishments a ON d.id = a.related_activity_id WHERE d.location = 'Home' AND a.accomplishment_date = '2021-09-15';
SELECT r.reflection_text, d.activity_name, r.reflection_date FROM reflections r INNER JOIN daily_activities d ON r.related_activity_id = d.id ORDER BY r.reflection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM accomplishments WHERE accomplishment_description LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY accomplishment_date DESC;
SELECT id, activity_name, description FROM daily_activities WHERE id = 100
SELECT accomplishment_name, accomplishment_date, notes FROM accomplishments WHERE accomplishment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT reflection_text FROM reflections ORDER BY reflection_date DESC
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE start_date < '2022-09-01'
SELECT * FROM daily_activities JOIN accomplishments ON daily_activities.activity_date = accomplishments.accomplishment_date
SELECT * FROM daily_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT accomplishment_name, accomplishment_date FROM accomplishments WHERE accomplishment_date > '2022-02-15';
SELECT reflection_date, reflection_text FROM reflections ORDER BY reflection_date DESC;
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE start_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT activity_name, description FROM daily_activities JOIN accomplishments ON daily_activities.activity_date = accomplishments.accomplishment_date;
SELECT * FROM daily_activities;
SELECT id, accomplishment_name, date FROM accomplishments WHERE date = '2022-01-12';
SELECT reflection_title, content FROM reflections ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, satisfaction_level FROM remote_work_life WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT username, email, country FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM daily_activities WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT accomplishment_name, details FROM accomplishments WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT reflection_title, content FROM reflections ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, hours_worked FROM remote_work_life WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT username, email, country FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
